title: Understanding Common Warts -- Prevention
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: How Can I Prevent Common Warts?
content: Follow these tips to prevent common warts:
bullets: Practice good hygiene when potentially coming in contact with someone with warts.
Avoid picking at a wart or the skin around a wart to prevent it from spreading.
Wear shoes in a locker room and public showers.
